title: Peru formalizes investigation of former President Pedro Castillo
description: Peru’s top prosecutor formalized an investigation into former President Pedro Castillo regarding criminal allegations from before Castillo was ousted and detained.

title: U.K. police ID body, ending mystery over disappearance that fueled media circus
description: The search for Nicola Bulley, a 45-year-old woman who vanished while walking her dog in a small English village, came to an end Monday when police said they had discovered her body.

title: After disfiguring acid attack, saxophone is Mexican female musician's 'sword'
description: Mexican saxophone musician María Elena Ríos, victim of an acid attack ordered by a former boyfriend and politician, wants to see great punishment for these attacks.

title: In Poland, Biden aims to pushback on Putin blaming the West for Ukraine war
description: President Joe Biden will speak in Poland to mark the one-year anniversary of the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

title: Live updates: Biden and Putin to speak ahead of Russia-Ukraine war's anniversary
description: Live updates: Biden and Putin to speak ahead of Russia-Ukraine war's anniversary

title: U.S. lawmakers visiting Taiwan affirm ‘shared values’
description: A delegation of U.S. lawmakers met with Taiwan’s president, who promised to deepen military cooperation between the two sides despite objections from China.

title: Inside Russia’s key ally Belarus as Eastern offensive grinds on
description: There are growing fears in the West that Russia’s new offensive in Ukraine might include sending troops across the Belarus side of the Ukrainian border. NBC News’ Keir Simmons has more details on Russia’s critical ally Belarus and the U.S. accusing China of considering supplying lethal arms to Russia.

title: Biden’s secret visit to Ukraine
description: President Biden made a historic and highly secretive trip to Kyiv, side-by-side with Ukraine’s President Zelenskyy. NBC News’ Kristen Welker and Richard Engel have more details on the surprise visit amid the ongoing conflict.
